short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT-powered Chrome assistant. Ezai Genie helps answer questions, provide recommendations, and analyze text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ezai Genie, a ChatGPT-powered Chrome assistant designed to enhance productivity, provide instant access to information, and help you stay organized effortlessly, all while browsing the web. With Ezai Genie, the world of information is just a chat away.

Key Features:

üåê Universal Compatibility - Seamlessly syncs to websites, allowing you to ask questions about the content, get summaries, and more.

üß† Smart Assistance - Powered by ChatGPT, Ezai Genie offers quick and helpful responses to any question you may have. From trivia to in-depth research, let Ezai Genie be your personal guide.

üìÅ Enhanced Organization - Stay organized with our user-friendly folder and bookmark system, making it easier than ever to keep track of important information.

üîÆ Unobtrusive Design - A discreet chat bubble on every website that expands into a full chat assistant when clicked, without cluttering your browsing experience.

How it works:

Ezai Genie is designed to be simple and intuitive. Just click on the small chat bubble available on any website, and it will expand into a full chat assistant, ready to help you with your inquiries. Ask questions about the website's content, request summaries, or dive into any topic that interests you. With Ezai Genie's advanced organization features, you can easily create folders and bookmarks to manage the information you discover.

Experience the future of web browsing with Ezai Genie, your personal ChatGPT-powered Chrome assistant. Download now and transform the way you interact with the web.
